mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`perms` FROM tf_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN `tf_sysrole` r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` LEFT JOIN `tf_sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `tf_sysmenu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0

SELECT m.id, m.pid, m.menu_name, m.path FROM tf_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tf_sysrole r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN tf_sys_role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN tf_sysmenu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`type` = '0'
